data.title: Print Auction & Hal Gould Award Celebration Honoring Carol Keller
data.meta_description: Join us on Thursday, May 2, from 6:30 to 8:30 pm at the Colorado Photographic Arts Center's beautiful new gallery for its 2024 Print Auction & Hal
data.text:
Join us on Thursday, May 2, from 6:30 to 8:30 pm at the Colorado Photographic Arts Center’s beautiful new gallery for its 2024 Print Auction & Hal Gould Award Celebration honoring Carol Keller. Enjoy an elegant evening with catered hors d’oeuvres, cocktails, good company, and bidding on outstanding photography by local and national artists.

Your participation in this year’s Print Auction will help ensure that the Colorado Photographic Arts Center can continue its exhibitions, education, and community programs benefitting thousands of artists, students, photography enthusiasts, and visitors.

Tickets can be purchased at cpacphoto.org/2024-print-auction

CPAC’s Print Auction opens for bidding online on Thursday, April 18 at https://cpacphoto.cbo.io.

Print Auction Pop-Up Show: April 18–May 2, 2024

All the photographs, showing a wide range of artistry, can be viewed in our gallery for a limited time. Don’t miss the opportunity to see these works in person. You can then bid online through Clickbid for the chance to take one home!

Image credit: Copyright From the Hip Photo
